My Work

Sites

  • Rodolf Vanthuyne

    Website built using HTML, CSS and some javascript with jQuery. It also has a small custom built PHP CMS for uploading photos and blog posts.
    Rodolf is a guitar player in the region of Bordeaux, France. Check him out, he's really good!

  • Alpha Clean

    Alex is a Professional Carpet Cleaner operating in the Glasgow and Paisley area. He needed a straightforward website to advertise his business. By working together, we found a design that he liked, and one week later he had a fully responsive site.
    This site is made with HTML, CSS with a bit of javascript and PHP for the contact form.

  • Portfolio

    This site has been built using sass, javascript and jQuery. The built workflow is automated with gulp and NPM.

Skills

Master the basics and the rest will come easily. This is the advice I followed when starting to learn web technologies a few years ago. This lead me to have solid foundations in Web Standards, Accessibility, CSS and javascript, and the ability to quickly learn new tools when necessary.

About

Since graduating in Computer Engineering in 2002, I always worked in IT. First, as a Support Agent for Apple Computerâ€™s professional products (server and multimedia) and last, as a System and Applications Administrator for TimeInc. From my first role, I learned to solve complex problems, from my last one, I learned to avoid them to occur through careful planning and thorough testing.

I started learning Web Development during my spare time in 2012 because I was missing the good old days of coding at University. 4 years later, I have earned a web development certification, built a few sites, coded several plug-ins, read many books, fallen in a few traps and drank hectolitres of coffee... My aim is now to apply this knowledge, and learn more, as part of a dynamic company.
